description: Gets a list of runs for a machine learning transform. Machine learning task runs are asynchronous tasks that Glue runs on your behalf as part of various machine learning workflows. You can get a sortable, filterable list of machine learning task runs by calling GetMLTaskRuns with their parent transform's TransformID and other optional parameters as documented in this section. This operation returns a list of historic runs and must be paginated.

parameters.name: TransformId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the machine learning transform.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: The filter criteria, in the TaskRunFilterCriteria structure, for the task run. TaskRunType (string) --- The type of task run. Status (string) --- The current status of the task run. StartedBefore (datetime) --- Filter on task runs started before this date. StartedAfter (datetime) --- Filter on task runs started after this date.

nested_params.name: Status
nested_params.description: The current status of the task run.

nested_params.name: StartedBefore
nested_params.description: Filter on task runs started before this date.

nested_params.name: StartedAfter
nested_params.description: Filter on task runs started after this date.

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description: The sorting criteria, in the TaskRunSortCriteria structure, for the task run. The column to be used to sort the list of task runs for the machine learning transform. The sort direction to be used to sort the list of task runs for the machine learning transform.

nested_params.name: Column
nested_params.description: The column to be used to sort the list of task runs for the machine learning transform.

nested_params.name: SortDirection
nested_params.description: The sort direction to be used to sort the list of task runs for the machine learning transform.

nested_items.name: TaskRuns
nested_items.description: A list of task runs that are associated with the transform.

nested_items.name: TransformId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the transform.

nested_items.name: TaskRunId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for this task run.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the requested task run.

nested_items.name: LogGroupName
nested_items.description: The names of the log group for secure logging, associated with this task run.

nested_items.name: Properties
nested_items.description: Specifies configuration properties associated with this task run.

nested_items.name: TaskType
nested_items.description: The type of task run.

nested_items.name: ImportLabelsTaskRunProperties
nested_items.description: The configuration properties for an importing labels task run.

nested_items.name: InputS3Path
nested_items.description: The Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) path from where you will import the labels.

nested_items.name: Replace
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to overwrite your existing labels.

nested_items.name: ExportLabelsTaskRunProperties
nested_items.description: The configuration properties for an exporting labels task run.

nested_items.name: OutputS3Path
nested_items.description: The Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) path where you will export the labels.

nested_items.name: LabelingSetGenerationTaskRunProperties
nested_items.description: The configuration properties for a labeling set generation task run.

nested_items.name: OutputS3Path
nested_items.description: The Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) path where you will generate the labeling set.

nested_items.name: FindMatchesTaskRunProperties
nested_items.description: The configuration properties for a find matches task run.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: The job ID for the Find Matches task run.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The name assigned to the job for the Find Matches task run.

nested_items.name: JobRunId
nested_items.description: The job run ID for the Find Matches task run.

nested_items.name: ErrorString
nested_items.description: The list of error strings associated with this task run.

nested_items.name: StartedOn
nested_items.description: The date and time that this task run started.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedOn
nested_items.description: The last point in time that the requested task run was updated.

nested_items.name: CompletedOn
nested_items.description: The last point in time that the requested task run was completed.

nested_items.name: ExecutionTime
nested_items.description: The amount of time (in seconds) that the task run consumed resources.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token, if more results are available.
